en-US.summary: Thank a random person for their role on a movie.
examplePhrases: Ask movie kudos to thank someone from Star Wars
Ask movie kudos to give kudos to Harry Potter
en-US.name: Movie Kudos
en-US.description: Movie Kudos lets you learn about who worked on a movie, and what their role was. Everyone knows the main celebrities, but how about people in minor roles or background characters?
